name: GoLista
tag_list: location-based, marketing, advertising, platform, listing, coupon, deal, search, classified, yelp, city-guide, city-search, gps, geo-location, mobile, next-generation
overview:
GoLista (http://www.golista.com) a City Guide aimes to become the leading source for people to find and share the best local deals, events, classifieds, news and happenings all in one place. The company indexes local deals out of unique sources, including national brands, daily deal websites, local businesses and consumers, and makes previously hard-to-find deals easily discoverable and will only present listings in real-time which assures that only to the user relevant content will show. GoLista makes local deals available to people as in ANYthing ANYtime ANYwhere, through the mobile site, its website, social applications, and daily deals email. GoLista will soon showcases savings of more than $10 million available each day across multiple business categories.

Through its ContentExchange platform, GoLista will provides tools that allow publishers and developers to easily integrate local listings into their products.

products.name: Location Based Hardware or Software Real Time Redemption System
